jd: From: Suresh Babu, Teamware Solutions suresh.b@twsol.com Reply to: suresh.b@twsol.com Position: Pega DeveloperLocation: Schaumburg, IL (Onsite)Job Description: Extensive client handling experience Onsite offshore coordination Understand key value drivers and role in enterprise architecture Collaborate with Developers, Business Analyst, QA and all other stakeholders Team player with positive attitude and ability in quickly adapt to new TechnologiesEssential Skills:Having 12+ years of development experience, 10+ years of PEGA development exp Ability implement the rules and build low level design Knowledge and experience in integrations like SOAP Has experience in working Agile projectsDesirable SkillsKnowledge on XML , Java ,SQL Good knowledge of PEGA Guardrails.
